actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.
Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 93-1647.

official_title: A bill to amend the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act of 1974.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides that the members of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission may be appointed by the President without the advise and consent of the Senate. Requires the Commission to concurrently transmit to specified Congressional committees copies of any budget estimate or request which it submits to the President or the Office of Management and Budget.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Commodity Futures Trading Commission Act of 1974.
